title: LF Serious players (Bronze-Gold) wanting to win ranked/normals or not be flamed at.
body:
I'm Jellifluous, A player in Silver 5. It's my first season, and I've already met the frustrations of having to deal with solo queue players that won't agree/flame, or just straight up feed. So I'm looking for some players that you'd call serious or "tryhard" so we can rank up together, or practice in normals seriously.

My goal is to make it to gold and so I'd like to share that goal with some other people who'd like to climb :^)
Basically looking for people who know how to play a laning phase and won't flame if things go downhill

I main mid and support, hit me up ign Jellifluous
